content: Cryptogold is a decentralized and deflationary tokenCryptogold aims to create value by harnessing the power of Blockchain and Web3.Â Central to our project is the $CRYPTOGOLD tokenhttps://cryptogoldtoken.orgAll tokens are put in Uniswap liquidity pool and the lp tokens locked in Unicrypt.We set the max fee to 2% in the smart contract so that no one not even owner can change it to above 2% ever.Some of the fees collected shall be used for burning $CRYPTOGOLD token to create a delationary token.Smart Contract:https://etherscan.io/token/0x7724a11705a1D76e921A1085BDcE081B3500aF71Lp lock:https://app.uncx.network/amm/uni-v2/pair/0x873A9A9CCeeE787AB8c70e0A9f4cd71ed8101825Buy on Uniswap:https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x7724a11705a1D76e921A1085BDcE081B3500aF71Telegram: https://t.me/cryptogold_tokenTwitter: https://x.me/cryptogoldeth
